shellshocker

Class StatusTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • shellshocker.StatusTracker

  • public class StatusTracker
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a status tracker for the user-controlled character. Tracks and displays information such as health, points, shield, ammo, bomb, and fuel. in the specified Graphics context.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StatusTracker()
      Default constructor for the status tracker. Takes in images for display in the window.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void drawStatusBar(java.awt.Graphics window, int x, int y, int width, int height, Ragnar ragnar, boolean flame, boolean mine)
      Draws the status bar in the specified graphics context.
      void startTimer()
      Starts a timer that keeps track of the user's current time playing the game.
      void update(int p, int s, int a, int b, int m, int h, int f, int pl, int sl, int al, int bl, int ml, int hl, int fl, java.util.ArrayList<Boundary> bound, java.util.ArrayList<EnemySprite> enemy, java.util.ArrayList<Reactor> reactor)
      Updates the information for the status tracker.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • StatusTracker

        public StatusTracker()
        Default constructor for the status tracker. Takes in images for display in the window.

    • Method Detail

      • drawStatusBar

        public void drawStatusBar(java.awt.Graphics window,
                 int x,
                 int y,
                 int width,
                 int height,
                 Ragnar ragnar,
                 boolean flame,
                 boolean mine)
        Draws the status bar in the specified graphics context.
        Parameters:
        window - the specified Graphics context.
        x - the x-coordinate to draw the Status Bar.
        y - the y-coordinate to draw the Status Bar.
        width - the width of the Status Bar.
        height - the height of the Status Bar.
        mine - boolean value to indicate whether or not the mine dropping mechanism is on.
        ragnar - the user-controlled object reference.
        flame - boolean value to indicate whether or not the flamethrower mechanism is on.

      • update

        public void update(int p,
          int s,
          int a,
          int b,
          int m,
          int h,
          int f,
          int pl,
          int sl,
          int al,
          int bl,
          int ml,
          int hl,
          int fl,
          java.util.ArrayList<Boundary> bound,
          java.util.ArrayList<EnemySprite> enemy,
          java.util.ArrayList<Reactor> reactor)
        Updates the information for the status tracker.
        Parameters:
        p - the current point count.
        pl - the current point limit.
        s - the current shield value remaining.
        al - the current ammunition limit.
        b - the number of bombs remaining.
        m - the number of mines remaining.
        a - the amount of ammunition remaining.
        h - the amount of health remaining.
        sl - the current shield limit.
        f - the amount of fuel remaining.
        enemy - an ArrayList full of EnemySprite objects.
        bl - the current bomb limit.
        ml - the current mine limit.
        fl - the current fuel limit.
        bound - an ArrayList full of Boundary objects.
        hl - the current health limit.

      • startTimer

        public void startTimer()
        Starts a timer that keeps track of the user's current time playing the game.
